vulnerabilities: Information Exposure Through an Error Message
Use of GET Request Method With Sensitive Query Strings
description: The function is vulnerable to information exposure through error messages (CWE-209) as it logs error messages that contain sensitive information. It also exposes sensitive information (CWE-200) by not properly validating or sanitizing user input. The function also uses GET request method with sensitive query strings (CWE-598), which can expose sensitive information in server logs, referrer headers, and browser history.
